underlying_goal: Add a comment/discussion feature to a Writerside-based technical documentation site hosted on GitHub Pages
friction_detail: User interrupted Claude's initial Task tool use, then Claude provided a detailed plan with Giscus but the session ended before implementation was completed.
brief_summary: User asked how to add comments to their Writerside GitHub Pages site; Claude researched and recommended Giscus with implementation steps but the session ended before full implementation.
